item.title: MySQL tips and trick
item.description:
Mysql performance https://www.infoworld.com/article/0/database-administration/10-essential-performance-tips-for-mysql.html MySQL insert row with highest id
Lock tables customers write; $max = SELECT MAX( customer_id ) FROM customers; INSERT INTO customers( customer_id, firstname, surname ) VALUES ($max+1 , ‘jim’, ‘sock’) unlock tables; ref: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5360117/insert-and-set-value-with-max1-problems
mysqldump routines triggers view karena default nya mysql akan dump trigger, maka hanya store procedure / function atau yg dikenal dengan routines saja yang dimasukan parameter nya mysqldump –routines –no-create-info –no-data –no-create-db –skip-opt > outputfile.
